channel.title: Judgment at the Door; Jonahs in Fishes
channel.copyright: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons License - Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike - http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/2.0/
channel.description: Right now, The Church has glib Jonahs with tickets in hand, heading in the opposite direction from the call of God; others caught in horrendous storms and causing others to suffer as a result of their disobedience; many swallowed whole by something they can't get out of. Every one of our Jonahs have been called to be signs and wonders to a rebellious nation; all have been called to say one thing-"Repent"! This Podcast was created using www.talkshoe.com

item.title: Judgment at the Door; Jonahs in Fishes
item.author: goinwell@nc.rr.com
item.description:
Right now, The Church has:
1) glib Jonahs with tickets in hand, heading in the opposite direction from the call of God 2) others caught in horrendous storms and causing others to suffer as a result of their disobedience 3) many swallowed whole by something they can't get out of
Every one of our Jonahs have been called to be a sign and a wonder to a rebellious nation; all have been called to say one thing-"Repent"!
item.itunes:author: Mary Diane Goin
item.itunes:subtitle: Judgment at the Door; Jonahs in Fishes
item.itunes:summary:
Right now, The Church has:
1) glib Jonahs with tickets in hand, heading in the opposite direction from the call of God 2) others caught in horrendous storms and causing others to suffer as a result of their disobedience 3) many swallowed whole by something they can't get out of
Every one of our Jonahs have been called to be a sign and a wonder to a rebellious nation; all have been called to say one thing-"Repent"!
